author: The Linux Foundation
description:
Sponsored by Vultr

Managing AI workloads with Kubernetes can introduce unnecessary complexity. dstack, an open-source alternative, simplifies container orchestration for AI. In this talk, we’ll demonstrate how developers can leverage dstack to enhance AI development, training, and deployment, enabling seamless integration on Vultr leveraging GPUs from NVIDIA and AMD. The session will focus on use cases like fine-tuning and deploying models with DeepSeek.
title: LF Live Webinar:  Simplifying AI Container Orchestration on Vultr with dstack

author: The Linux Foundation
description:
From smarter energy control rooms to cost-cutting AI search and expanding broadband access, innovation is happening everywhere. But the real question is—are we moving fast enough?

💡 The Linux Foundation is driving these breakthroughs with:
✅ AI search optimizations reducing memory usage for massive datasets
✅ Quantum-safe cryptography pushing security beyond today’s encryption
✅ Next-gen broadband & networking built for open, scalable access

We cover it all in this week’s LF Quick Hits—in just 60 seconds. Watch now! 🎥👇

📰 Missed this week’s biggest open source updates? Here’s what’s shaping the future:

🔹 Making AI search faster & cheaper – https://hubs.la/Q03845Gr0
🔹 Powering the future of energy grids – https://hubs.la/Q0383-Qb0
🔹 Expanding high-speed broadband – https://hubs.la/Q0383WNK0
🔹 Keeping cloud-native security strong – https://hubs.la/Q0384dQr0
🔹 Advancing performance, networking for cloud & edge: https://hubs.la/Q0383_Fw0
🔹 Building a quantum-safe future – https://hubs
title: Open source is making bold moves across AI, networking, and even post-quantum security.
